title: Privacy Policy
s1Text: Autodoc Processamento de Dados Ltda. (CNPJ: 04.714.448/0001-28) is committed to protecting the personal data of its users, in compliance with Brazil's General Data Protection Law (Law No. 13,709/2018 â€” LGPD).
s2Text: We may collect the following personal data:
s2Items: Name, email, phone, and company (contact forms)
s3Text: The collected data is used to:
s3Items: Respond to contact and demo requests
Send communications related to our services
s4Text: Your data is not sold to third parties. It may be shared with Ambar group companies exclusively for service provision purposes, always in compliance with LGPD.
s5Text: We use essential cookies for website functionality and analytical cookies to improve your experience. You can manage your cookie preferences at any time through the consent banner.
s6Items: Correction of incomplete or outdated data
s7Text: To exercise your rights or clarify questions about this policy, contact us at
